name: Abalyte
description: Abalyte is a 2D-roguelike metroidvania that focuses on the player's skill and inventiveness. While other games have crutches or progression systems that help the player beat the game, Abalyte does the opposite and throws you in a spike-pit.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX11 Compliant Graphics Card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 MB available space
